topContributors.funFact: Most active at 7am - before everyone else wakes up
Used 423 emojis this year - a new channel record

funFacts.label: Peak Hour
funFacts.detail: Most messages are sent right after lunch - the productivity hour!

funFacts.label: Longest Message
funFacts.detail: An epic 847-word product spec that sparked a 50-message thread

funFacts.label: Favorite Emoji
funFacts.detail: The rocket emoji was used 234 times - this team loves shipping!

funFacts.label: Busiest Day
funFacts.detail: Tuesdays had 23% more messages than any other day

interesting: Q2 was your most active quarter with 412 messages
The team grew from 18 to 23 contributors this year
Average message length increased 15% - more detailed discussions
funny: Someone typed 'just a quick question' 47 times - none were quick
The word 'urgent' appeared 89 times, usually on Fridays at 4pm
roasts: The team used 'ASAP' 156 times but the average response time was 4 hours

yearStory.opening: The year began with ambitious product goals and a team ready to ship.
yearStory.arc: Q2 saw unprecedented collaboration as the team rallied around the new feature launch.
yearStory.climax: The September release marked a turning point - your biggest update ever.
yearStory.closing: The year ended with a leaner, faster product and a stronger team.

topicHighlights.insight: 47% of Q2 messages focused on the new dashboard
topicHighlights.bestQuote: It's live! The dashboard is finally in production!
The NPS score jumped 15 points after the redesign

bestQuotes.text: We did it! Biggest launch of the year and zero incidents.
bestQuotes.author: David Shalom

bestQuotes.text: This is the smoothest sprint we've ever had.
bestQuotes.author: Alice Chen
